params.amount: amount of the collateral to be slashed
params.captureTimestamp: time point when the stake was captured
params.subnetwork: full identifier of the subnetwork (address of the network concatenated with the uint96 identifier)

PERIOD().notice: Get a period during which the slashing should occur to reset the operator's stake.

SLASH_COUNT().notice: Get a number of slashes that should occur during the PERIOD to reset the operator's stake.
